forum.content:
Nice to meet you. I am Sam in Taipei.
I am Taiwanese Mandarin native speaker and searching a girl native English speak( from USA ,Canada or U.K. Is well) who wanna learn and practice Mandarin. (For me, I'd like to improve the comprehension of English listening and speaking)

If you are interested, we could meet near Taipei City Hall Station. Hope see you very soon!😄 (Please whisper me)

By the way, I like to hike during the weekend, if you like too, maybe we could go together :)
forum.title: English exchange partner
